summary: A container object representing the body of a challenge resource, wrapping a challenge instance and exposing its fields directly while also holding status, validation timestamp, and error information. It supports attribute delegation, iteration, JSON serialization, encoding, and URI construction.
business_intent: To provide a convenient, selfâ€‘describing representation of an ACME challenge for communication with the server, enabling easy access to challenge data, tracking of processing status and errors, and conversion to the formats required by the protocol.
